title: Demi Lovato stuns in Marie Antoinette-inspired Halloween costume
text:
Demi Lovato took Halloween to another level when she donned a Marie Antoinette costume on Instagram.

Lovato, 27, posted a series of images on Thursday, showing off the intricate details of her Queen of France attire. The costume featured a busty corset, thick white makeup and an enormous bouffant wig.

“Halloween round 1... I told y’all I don’t play on Halloween!!” Lovato captioned the image. “It’s my time to shine 😝✨ glam team killed it 🙌🏼👏🏼."

DEMI LOVATO ROCKS BIKINI AMID 'BACHELORETTE' STAR MIKE JOHNSON DATING RUMORS

The pop star was given a full makeover by hairstylist Paul Norton along with celebrity makeup and hair artist Etienne Ortega in preparation for an undisclosed Halloween event. Fans were completely stunned by the magnificent costume.

DEMI LOVATO APOLOGIZES FOR 'OFFENDING ANYONE' FOLLOWING 'MAGICAL' TRIP TO ISRAEL

“You are so beautiful 😍,” one user commented.

“Perfect,” another user simply stated.
description: Demi Lovato took Halloween to another level when she donned a Marie Antoinette costume on Instagram this Thursday. Lovato, 27, posted a series of images to Instagram Thursday night, showing off the intricate details of her Queen of France attire. Equipped with a busty corset, thick white make-up and an enormous bouffant wig, the star took to Instagram for a pre-Halloween celebration.
